entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
